heroSubheadline: Revolutionizing dental restoration with ExoCAD integration, real-time tracking, and instant online payments
theonlylab: The only lab in Egypt with a fully digital workflow
ourServiceSubtitle: Premium dental restorations crafted with precision and care
egyptsFirstDigitalLab: Egypt's first fully digital dental laboratory.
aboutSubtitleText: We are Egypt's first fully digital dental laboratory, combining expert craftsmanship with cutting-edge digital technologies. Our team uses ExoCAD and CAD/CAM systems to deliver flawless dental restorations with unmatched precision and speed.
whatMakesUsUniqueText: Our digital workflow allows you to easily choose services and materials and track every stage of your case online — providing transparency and peace of mind.
educationalResourcesText: We offer guides, workshops, and tutorials on ExoCAD best practices, digital implant planning, and material selection — helping dental professionals stay ahead.
crownsBridgesDescription: High-precision ceramic and zirconia restorations with perfect fit and aesthetics
dentalImplantsDescription: Custom abutments and crowns designed for optimal implant integration
veneersDescription: Ultra-thin porcelain veneers for stunning smile transformations
surgicalGuidesDescription: 3D-printed guides for precise implant placement and predictable outcomes
seamlessDigitalWorkflowSubtitle: A seamless digital workflow from scan to delivery
secureUploadDescription: Directly upload your ExoCAD files through our secure cloud platform.
payOnlineDescription: secure payments with instant digital invoicing. Flexible monthly payment
liveTrackingDescription: Monitor your case 24/7 with real-time updates during CAD/CAM fabrication.
fastDeliveryDescription: Receive your high-precision order with our guaranteed fast turnaround.
followDentalCase: Follow your dental case from upload to delivery — every stage, visible in real-time.
chooseYourMaterialTrackOrder: Choose Your Material & Track Your Order Online
uploadExocadText: Upload your ExoCAD file, select your preferred material, shade, and design options – and our lab will start manufacturing instantly. You can follow your order's progress online, step by step.
stayAheadGuides: Stay ahead with our comprehensive guides and learning materials
digitalImplantPlanningDesc: Learn how to create precise surgical guides and achieve predictable implant outcomes with digital workflows.
exocadBestPracticesDesc: Master ExoCAD software with our expert tips and techniques for designing perfect dental restorations.
materialSelectionGuideDesc: Discover which materials work best for different clinical situations and patient requirements.
meetIndustryLeaders: Meet industry leaders and innovators shaping the future of digital dentistry
digitalDentistrySummitDesc: Discover innovations transforming the dental industry from experts worldwide.
handsOnCadCamDesc: Live demonstration and interactive training on digital workflow tools.
futureDentalTechnologyDesc: Inspiring talks from thought leaders driving digital transformation.
startJourney: Start your journey with us. Fill in the details to get started.
loginAcknowledgment: By logging in, you acknowledge that **manual verification** is required for security and compliance purposes. We l notify you once your account is activated.
achievementsSubtitle: Numbers that reflect our dedication and success in digital dentistry.
contactSubtitle: Have questions? We are here to help you transform your dental practice with digital innovation.
cavityRestorationDesc: Treating cavities using dental fillings, crowns, or inlays.
endodonticTreatmentDesc: Root canals where students practice removing infected tissue and sealing it.
compositeBondingDesc: Repairing chipped or cracked teeth with tooth-colored resins.
bracesAndAlignersDesc: Designing braces or aligners to correct misalignment issues.
retentionPlansDesc: Creating retainers for maintaining teeth alignment after braces.
gumDiseaseTreatmentDesc: Scaling and root planning procedures to treat gum disease.
softTissueGraftingDesc: Reconstructing gums to treat gum recession.
nameMinLength: Name must be at least 3 characters.
messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters.
educationalSubtitle: Expert insights and tips for maintaining your oral health
thankYouRegistering: Thank you for registering! Your account submission is **currently pending approval** by our team.
reviewingDetails: We are reviewing your details and aim to complete the process within **1-2 business days**. You will receive an **email notification** at your registered address once your account is active.
needHelpSupport: Need help? Visit our support center or check your email spam folder.
enterStrongPassword: Enter a strong new password. Your password should contain at least 8 characters, including uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special symbols.
passwordResetSuccess: Password reset successfully. You will be redirected to login.
failedResetPassword: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
afterResetRedirect: After resetting your password, you will be redirected to the login page automatically.
keepPasswordSecure: Keep your password secure and do not share it with anyone.
issuesLoggingIn: If you experience any issues logging in, you can request a new reset link.
ensureEmailAccessible: Ensure your email inbox is accessible to receive future notifications.
contactSupportTeam: For assistance, contact our Support Team.
accountSecuritySeriously: We take your account security seriously. Make sure your password is strong and never share it with anyone.
